domosaics.ui.workspace
Class WorkspaceView

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JTree
                  domosaics.ui.workspace.WorkspaceView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable
public class WorkspaceView
extends javax.swing.JTree

The workspace panel which is basically just a JTree wrapped in a JScrollPane.

This class only is for the use of displaying. To change the underlying data model see methods in Workspace which triggers automatically the tree model when its changed which results in an repaint of this view.

To access the methods and this view the WorkspaceManager should be used.

Author:
Andreas Held
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

WorkspaceView

public WorkspaceView(Workspace workspace)
Basic constructor for the workspace view which generates the JTree based on the backend workspace model.

Parameters:
workspace - the backend data model which should be represented by this view
Method Detail

getParentPane

public javax.swing.JPanel getParentPane()
Method to get a grip on the panel which embeds this view. For instance to display it within the AngstdDesktop.

Returns:
the panel embedding the JTree workspace

getComponent

public java.awt.Component getComponent()
To access the JTree directly this method can be used. (But its not within the program so far)

Returns:
the JTree component (GUI component for the workspace)

expandAll

public void expandAll()
Because there is no control over the collapsing behavior of the JTree within WorkspaceTreeModel this is a helper method to expand the hole tree each time it was changed. This would be a point for future development.
